name: CrankGames
description:
Two short games for the Playdate, both primarily utilizing the crank.

Time

See how close you can simulate the second hand on a clock. Starting at the top, rotate the crank at the same speed as the second hand of a clock. At the end, you'll be given the minimum and maximum amounts of time you were off by as well as an overall average.

Angle

See how close you can come to a given random angle. Rotate the crank to point to an angle. try to get as close as possible to the given angle within the allotted time.

Use the menu button to switch between games

Please see the official instructions for sideloading a game on Playdate.
